document_name: Law No. 18.597 on the Efficient Use of Energy in the National Territory
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/URY/2009/URY-2009-09-21-Law No. 18.597 on the Efficient Use of Energy in the National Territory_bd3136de93c987f98cefce116bffe38c.pdf
document_description: Declares the efficient use of energy to be in the national interest, lays down rules for its promotion and regulation. Has references to reduction of greenhouse gas emissions.
